title: Calendar and contacts integration with Gnome on Ubuntu
content:
Hi everyone!

Coming from Evolution I'm used to having the calendar events and contacts synchronized from CalDAV and CardDAV to the Gnome calendar and contacts app. Especially the calendar integration is really helpful for keeping up with daily meetings. Now with Thunderbird the calendar inside Thunderbird works great, but it shows "No events" in the Gnome calendar.

Ubuntu 22.04 Gnome Calendar: 41.2 Thunderbird: 115.0 (Mozilla Thunderbird Snap for Ubuntu)

I'm using Snap on Ubuntu, but I'm open to moving to another installation if that would be helpful. I'd LOVE to see this fixed somehow, or suggestions to getting this to work with any external tool that either integrates with Thunderbird or runs in the background, so no Evolution :-)

Thanks all and have a great day!
creator: thomaslobker

title: evidenziare nuovi messaggi thunderbird 115
content: Buongiorno, sono/ero utente Thunderbird 102.13.0 (64Bit) dove avevo creato userChrome.css per evidenziare email nuove in colore giallo. Dopo aggiornamento a Thunderbird 115 non riesco più ad avere questo effetto. Il file userChrome.css esiste nella cartella Chrome, Toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets è a true, ma le email risultano sempre evidenziate in grassetto Bianche. grazie cordiali saluti
creator: voyager956

title: Mittente nelle PEC
content: Da alcuni giorni, nella posta PEC tutti gli indirizzi dei mittenti sono stati modificati in un unico mittente con la dicitura: "Per conto di:protocollo@comune.bosa.or.it" eccetto i mittenti che avevano legalmail. Come si può ovviare? Grazie.
creator: studio.ingsaba

title: Corrupted incoming emails
content:
I am having problems with some, but not all, incoming messages on one of my computers. The messages appear correctly on other computers.

Some messages appear only in html format.

Other messages have the header but there is nothing in the content part of the message.

Other message have the correct heading but the content is from messages received LATER, this can be two or three emails in a row have the content from a later email.
creator: sprung

title: Download Thunderbird old version
content: Hi, How can I do to download the Thunderbird 78.14.0 version (for my mac OS 10.10.5) ? Thanks, Thierry
creator: pichont
